Element.Name: Specification identification
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Profile ID
Element.Description: Identifies the Peppol profile or business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: An transaction instance must contain an identifier. The identifier enables positive referencing the document instance for various purposes including referencing between transactions that are part of the same process.

Element.Name: Issue Date
Element.Description: The date when the Transportation Status was issued. Format = "YYYY-MM-DD". ? <?Cardinality 1..1

Element.Name: Issue Time
Element.Description: The time when the Transportation Status was issued. Format = "hh:mm:ss".

Element.Name: Description
Element.Description: Textual description of the Transportation Status.

Element.Name: Shipping Order ID
Element.Description: An identifier (in the form of a reference number) of the shipping order or forwarding instruction associated with this shipment.

Element.Name: Transportation Status Type Code
Element.Description: The type of status being reported.

Element.Name: Transportation Execution Status Code
Element.Description: The status of the transport expressed as a code.

Element.Name: Consignment information
Element.Description: An identifiable collection of goods items sent from one party (the Despatch Party) to another party (the Consignee) via one or more modes of transport.

Element.Name: Consignment identifier
Element.Description: Id for the consignment, often a number from the Transport Service provider. If this ID is in the GINC format, it should be indicated in the attribute @schemeID. Use N/A if not applicable.

Attribute.Description: Used to indicate that the ID is in the GINC (Global Identification Number for Consignment) format. This number identifies a consignment, which is a logical grouping of goods (one or more logistics units) transferred to a freight forwarder to be transported for a specific journey. The consignment number must be allocated by a freight forwarder (or a carrier acting as a freight forwarder) or a consignor, but only if prior agreement of the freight forwarder is given.

Element.Name: Status
Element.Description: Staus related to the consignment as a whole.

Element.Name: Status
Element.Description: Specifies the status condition of the related object.

Element.Name: Status description
Element.Description: Description of the status.

Element.Name: Transport Event
Element.Description: A transport event associated to this Transportation Status.

Element.Name: Identification ID
Element.Description: Identifices the transport event.

Element.Name: Occurrence Date
Element.Description: The date the transport event occured.

Element.Name: Occurrence Time
Element.Description: The time the transport event occured.

Element.Name: Transport Event Type Code
Element.Description: An indicator ('true' or 'false') indicating whether the transport event is completed or not.

Element.Name: Completion Indicator
Element.Description: A code specifying the requested transport event type.

Element.Name: Status
Element.Description: Staus related to the consignment as a whole.

Element.Name: Status
Element.Description: Specifies the status condition of the related object.

Element.Name: Status
Element.Description: Description of the status.

Element.Name: Status Reason code
Element.Description: The reason of the status expressed as a code.

Element.Name: Status Reason
Element.Description: The reason for this status expressed as text.

Element.Name: Signature
Element.Description: A signature applied to this transport event.

Element.Name: Identifier Signature
Element.Description: The Id of the Signature.
The date upon which this signature was verified. Format = "YYYY-MM-DD".
The local time at which this signature was verified. Format = "hh:mm:ss".

Element.Name: Signature party
Element.Description: The party signing this event.

Element.Name: Consignee party name
Element.Description: The name of the signatory party.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: The postal address of the signatory party

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country subdivision
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The country for the address

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Person
Element.Description: The person who applies the signature on behalf of the signatory party.

Element.Name: Person ID
Element.Description: The ID for a person. The type of ID can be specified in a schemeID.

Element.Name: First Name
Element.Description: The persons first name.

Element.Name: Family Name
Element.Description: The persons family name.

Element.Name: Job title
Element.Description: The persons job title.

Element.Name: Attachment
Element.Description: The actual signature included or refered to as an attachment .

Element.Name: Embedded binary object
Element.Description: The referenced document can here be inserted as a binary object.

Element.Name: External reference
Element.Description: A reference to an attached document that is external to the document(s) being exchanged.

Element.Name: Address to internet resource
Element.Description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies the external object as an Internet resource.

Element.Name: Period
Element.Description: The updated period for this transport event. Unse only if the event has not occured.
The start date of the period.
The start time of the period.
The end date of the period.
The end time of the period.

Element.Name: Transport handling Unit
Element.Description: The transport handling unit refered to in this Transportation Status.

Element.Name: Identifier transport handling unit
Element.Description: The Transport Handling Unit is identified with a Serial Shipping Container Code (SSCC). The GS1 identification key used to identify logistics units. The key comprises an extension digit, GS1 Company Prefix, serial reference and check digit.

Element.Name: Status
Element.Description: Status related to the transport handling unit.

Element.Name: Status
Element.Description: Specifies the status condition of the related object.

Element.Name: Status
Element.Description: Description of the status.

Element.Name: Transport Event
Element.Description: A transport event related to this Transportation Status.

Element.Name: Identification ID
Element.Description: Identifices the transport event.

Element.Name: Occurence Date
Element.Description: The date the transport event occured.

Element.Name: Occurence Time
Element.Description: The time the transport event occured.

Element.Name: Transport Event Type Code
Element.Description: A code specifying the requested transport event type.

Element.Name: Completion Indicator
Element.Description: A code specifying the requested transport event type.

Element.Name: Status
Element.Description: Staus related to the consignment as a whole.

Element.Name: Status
Element.Description: Specifies the status condition of the related object.

Element.Description: The reason of the status expressed as a code.

Element.Name: Status Reason
Element.Description: The reason for this status expressed as text.

The local time at which this signature was verified.. Format = "hh:mm:ss".

Element.Name: Period
Element.Description: The updated period for this transport event. Unse only if the event has not occured.
The start date of the period.
The start time of the period.
The end date of the period.
The end time of the period.

Element.Name: Document reference
Element.Description: Reference to additional documents relevant for this Transportation Status such as pictures of damages.

Element.Name: Identity of the reference
Element.Description: The reference number of added document

Element.Name: Document type code
Element.Description: The type of reference. Must me part of UNCL1001

Element.Name: Document type
Element.Description: The type of reference that cannot be specified by a code

Element.Name: Attachment
Element.Description: Group to describe an attached document. An attachment can refer to an external document or be included with the document being exchanged.

Element.Name: Embedded binary object
Element.Description: The referenced document can here be inserted as a binary object.

Element.Name: External reference
Element.Description: A reference to an attached document that is external to the document(s) being exchanged.

Element.Name: Address to internet resource
Element.Description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies the external object as an Internet resource.

Element.Name: Sender party
Element.Description: The party sending the Transportation Status.

Element.Name: Sender party electronic address
Element.Description: The endpoint for the sender party.

Element.Name: Sender party identification
Element.Description: An identifier for the sender party as known to the receiver party.

Element.Name: Sender party name
Element.Description: The name of the sender party.

Element.Name: Postal address
Element.Description: The postal address for the sender party.

Element.Name: Address line 1
Element.Description: The main address line in a postal address usually the street name and number.

Element.Name: Address line 2
Element.Description: An additional address line in a postal address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line. Common use are secondary house number in a complex or in a building.

Element.Name: City
Element.Description: The common name of the city where the postal address is. The name is written in full rather than as a code.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.

Element.Name: Country sub entity
Element.Description: For specifying a region, county, state, province etc. within a country by using text.

Element.Name: Address line 3
Element.Description: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Party tax scheme
Element.Description: The tax information about the sender party.

Element.Name: Company ID
Element.Description: The Sender Party Value Added Tax identifer.

Element.Name: Tax scheme identifier
Element.Description: Tax scheme identifier. E.g. "VAT" or "GST".

Element.Name: Sender party name
Element.Description: The name of the sender party.

Element.Name: Sender parties legal registration name
Element.Description: The official name of the party as registered with the relevant fiscal authority.

Attribute.Name: Scheme identifier
Attribute.Description: The identification scheme identifier of the sender partys legal registration identifier

Element.Name: City name
Element.Description: The name of the city.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The residens country for the sender party.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code that identifies the country. The lists of valid countries are registered with the ISO 3166-1 Maintenance agency, "Codes for the representation of names of countries and their subdivisions". Codes must be according to the alpha-2 representation.

Element.Name: Contact
Element.Description: The contact of the sender party.

Element.Name: Contact name
Element.Description: The contact name.

Element.Name: Contact telephone number
Element.Description: The phone number of the contact.

Element.Name: Contact email address
Element.Description: The electronic mail of the contact.

Element.Name: Receiver Party
Element.Description: The party receiving the Transportation Status.

Element.Name: Receiver party electronic address
Element.Description: The endpoint id for the receiver party.

Element.Name: Receiver party identification
Element.Description: An identifier for the receiver party.

Element.Name: Receiver party name
Element.Description: The name of the receiver party.

Element.Name: Additional document reference
Element.Description: Reference to a Transportation Status Request.

Element.Name: Identity of the reference
Element.Description: The reference number of added document

Element.Name: Issue Date
Element.Description: The date when the Transportation Status Request was issued

Element.Name: Issue Time
Element.Description: The time when the Transportation Status Request was issued

Element.Description: Reference to a Transport Execution Plan.

Element.Description: The reference number of added document

Element.Name: Issue Date

Element.Name: Issue Time
